Package element.dynam

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
element.Element
element.dynam.DynamicElement
element.dynam.Hero
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementInterface
public class Hero extends DynamicElement
Hero object which the player controls. This object is responsible with interacting with the various elements of the maze.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero​(PositionInterface position, String color, com.googlecode.lanterna.SGR format, String character)
      Constructor for the Hero class. Receives a position, color, format, and character to represent the object.
      Parameters:
      position - sets the position of the element on the lanterna screen.
      color - sets the color of the element on the lanterna screen.
      format - sets the format of the element on the lanterna screen.
      character - sets the character of the element on the lanterna screen.
